page.title: 03West Midland Farmers
page.content: On the other side of Winford is Chew Magna. On the road to Chew Magna is an organisation called West Midland farmers. This specialises in selling and buying animal food and fertilisers and also pesticides. When you go in you will park your vechicle under a canopy so the feed will not get wet. After this you will have to walk in the office and tell the man behind the desk what you want. The man behind the desk will usually be a man called David. Dave will write out your bill then go out in to the mill house and get what you want. You then get him to put it in the boot then you can go.
